title: Python 101 for Data Science
name: Python 101 for Data Science
body:
Python 101 for Data Science
  • Topics Covered: Types, Expressions and Variables, String Operations, Lists and Tuples, Sets, Dictionaries, Conditions and Branching, Loops, Functions, Objects and Classes, Reading files with open, Writing files with open, Loading data with Pandas, Working with and Saving data with Pandas.
  • Issuing Organization: IBM Cognitive Class
  • Issuing Date: July 2020.
  • Credential ID: 1346e0cfbae547528d904fa022e71f35.
  • Credential URL: Verify Certification
